title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 3B.01 - Yellow Center Line Pavement Markings and Warrants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 3B.01 - Yellow Center Line Pavement Markings and Warrants

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 03. INSERT the following paragraph: Option: 02A On roadways without continuous center line pavement
markings, short sections may be marked with center line pavement markings to
control the position of traffic at specific locations, such as around curves, over hills, on approaches to grade crossings, at grade crossings, at bridges, and on approaches to intersections. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
3B.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
